Thanks for all of the responses! The answer is Security Analysis by Ben Graham and David Dodd. As a bonus, Graham refers to a book called "The Investment Value of Goodwill" by Lawrence Bloomberg, published in 1938. I'm working on getting a copy. https://t.co/PbR2nGh6E9
